fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Once per game,During the night, you can cause the  day to be skipped and go to the next night.
afterwards , there will be 2 executions (2 days).
Game will continue as normal after that (i.e  goes to night)
attributes:
-you win if you completed your goal even while dead/died later on (i.e; if you die during the night of the double execution; and there is 2 different alignment exe; you win)
-yes, you can be the 2nd execution and win if the 1st wasn't a neutral.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: execute two players of different alignments during the double execution.
